msbt.message: To the luckiest pluckiest finder of all!
Hoppity ho! What a happy find!
This is a hippity-bippity bottle of joy!
Boingity boing and congrats to you! You just got yourself an egg recipe! Can you hear the applause? Could there be others out there?! Open your peepers and look about. The answer is yours to find!
You picked this up, so YOU get the prize: an egg recipe! Oh wonderful day! Oh wonderful you! Could this be your lucky item?! You better start crafting it lickety- split if you want to find out!
Here's an egg recipe present just for wonderful ol' you! What kind of recipe could it be? What will it make? It's a hippity-skippity MYSTERY! Gather up eggs to craft it and see!
